alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 2:00PM AKDT until August 21 at 9:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Including the following area, Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 215 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 200 PM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in The mainstem Kenai River. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near the Kenai River. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.5 inches are possible. - The mainstem Kenai River is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
